== GNOME 3 Release Party 2011 Zurich ==

With the release of the upcoming Natty Narwhal version, Ubuntu switches from GNOME to unity, but GNOME will still be available through PPA.

Version 3 of GNOME breaks known paradigm of typical desktop environment and innovates the user experience.

To celebrate the release of GNOME 3 and to introduce the new features, we are organizing a Release Event:

If you are interested, you are invited to join us:

=== Date and time ===

Friday, 8th April 2011 from 15.00 to 19.00

* 15.00 to 17.00 - Informal discussions and exchanging views on Linux distributions and desktops in general.
* 17.00 to 19.00 - Live demonstration and presentation of GNOME 3.0 in different distributions.

Location: <nowiki>[[http://www.rauminfo.ethz.ch/grundrissplan.gif?region=Z&areal=Z&gebaeude=HG&geschoss=F&raumNr=26.3|HG F 26.3,ETH ZÃ¼rich]]</nowiki>

=== Attendance ===

No pre-registration required.

=== Further Information ===

For further information, please visit the event page on <nowiki>[[http://live.gnome.org/ThreePointZero/LaunchParty/Switzerland/Zurich|live.gnome.org]]</nowiki>
